author: DANIEL ZELTER
subject: Lupin typing game details
body:
This came in from www.animenewsservice.com :

"Sega WOW Entertainment has confirmed that they will be showing a new Naomi 
keyboarding arcade game Lupin the 3rd The Typing at the AOU 2002 Amusement 
Expo on February 23. The game is planned for an April release in arcade. The 
game is based on the classic TV animated cartoon series, the game supports 
up to 2 players simultaneously, and it is possible to select either Kanzi or 
Roman character input method."
